reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and informative. She explains complex concepts clearly and is always willing to help students outside of class.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Professor Thompson knows his material well, but his lectures can be a bit dry. Participation in class discussions helps a lot.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is a great teacher who makes math interesting. Her exams are challenging but fair, and she provides plenty of resources for studying.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Professor Smith is knowledgeable, but his teaching style is hard to follow. The lectures often feel disorganized.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is fantastic! Her passion for chemistry is infectious, and she makes sure everyone understands the material before moving on.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Professor Davis is very knowledgeable and his labs are well-structured. He encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson makes economics fascinating. Her real-world examples make the subject come alive.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Professor Green's classes are informative, but sometimes the lectures lack engagement.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. White challenges students to think deeply and critically. Her classes are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Professor Clark's lectures are often unorganized, making it difficult to follow the material.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is an amazing lecturer who makes psychology exciting and accessible.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Professor Walker is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be monotonous at times.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Hall's passion for literature is evident. She encourages lively discussions in class.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Professor Scott is an inspiring teacher who brings music theory to life.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. King is dedicated to her field and provides students with hands-on learning experiences.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Professor Young's classes are challenging, but sometimes the material is presented too quickly.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is an excellent professor who provides valuable insights into the business world.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Professor Anderson's classes are rigorous, but he prepares students well for exams.

reviews.subject: Nursing
reviews.review: Dr. Hernandez is a compassionate educator who truly cares about her students' success.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Professor Moore's lectures are informative, but sometimes lack engagement.
